room_title: Escape room "Tunnels Under London" by Edge Of Escape in Chicago
review: Top escape room experience in area! Would rate number one of a dozen escape rooms Iâ€™ve done because the owner and creator Tony really put a lot of imagination to the room with minimum outside influences. You need an open mindset going to the room. Good luck!

room_title: Escape room "Tunnels Under London" by Edge Of Escape in Chicago
review: We did Tunnels of London with four forty-somethings, two college age adults an 11-year-old and a 9-year-old. It was amazing. The young ones were absolutely able to contribute and it was super challenging for the rest of us. The story, craftsmanship and creativity that went into this escape experience were so impressive. Even though we failed to escape, we had a terrific time trying. We will be back to try the other room!

room_title: Escape room "Tunnels Under London" by Edge Of Escape in Chicago
review: What a wonderful expertise me, my wife and kids (ages 8 and 11) had.  We were a little escape room challenged and needed an embarrassing large number of hints, but the owner was fantastic and willing to help us along. The facility is amazing, and we had an absolutely blast on the Tunnels Under London room. We will be back to try the other room.
